response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,000,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an attractive price of $950,000. This represents a special discount, allowing you to enjoy substantial savings while securing a high-quality asset that aligns with your expectations. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us, and I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
